Because of challenges such as COPPA (the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act), mainstream social networks such as Facebook and Twitter require members to be at least 13 years of age. With this in mind, WhatsWhat.me (Beta) was created to be safe, secure and age-appropriate with highly sophisticated privacy and security measures in place, and in strict adherence to COPPA regulations.
